website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary design provides a unique look with extra display and storage space. A good piece if you want something small that adds some personality.
pros: Beautiful, rich color pulls both blacks and grays together
Reasonable price for a contemporary piece
Bottom shelf is large enough for an 8-inch by 10-inch picture frame
cons: Angle of supports can make assembly difficult

customer_reviews.title: I recommended it. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I am looking for. I recommended it. Well made. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Dalmasso

customer_reviews.title: Nice Console Accent Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice contemporary accent piece for an entryway or at the top of my stairway. Assembly was a bit trying. Some of the hardware did not align properly (I think this may be due to the angled design; but that is also what makes this piece unique). The table looks great after assembly but is a little unstable and may tip if you place anything with substantial weight. Hardware and instructions for wall anchoring were included, but that is beyond my expertise. I am not a do it your-selfer and it took me a while to put it together. All things considered it seems a little overpriced. Overall, I do like the design and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: I❤️Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small bar. Very nice quality. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: I'm am beyond pissed. I get the thing and it doesn't even assemble properly! The way the instruction depict..the unfinished piece of crap wooden side of the bottom board would be facing the front. The way the holes for the screws match up with the diagram have the finished side facing the back board where it would be unseen and the wood would be in front. What on earth! Here it is Saturday and I'm trying to put this crap together and I been waiting for this and this is what I get?? Crap. Absolute crap.
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: SO PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed. Fits snugly right at my entry door. I got those cast iron palm hands dish to throw my keys in upon entry and that sits right in the middle. The only draw back I had on assembly were the legs for the base . for the life of me I could not get that peg for the long secure screw to align to secure it better. So I just left it alone fore now. I suggest using that Gorilla glue on some attach parts, may take a while to dry but once it sets it does hold. Other than that I really do admire it's design. Just what I needed. Thank you very much :-)
customer_reviews.author: Feel Dis Beat

customer_reviews.title: Creates a lovely area.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Although instructions said about 20 minutes took me about one hour. The diagram instruction was detailed with steps 1-4 but I follow better with words and diagram.....none the less if you have put together other tables/selves you will be fine! Needed for my small area and to have a place for mail and keys to keep off my dining table.....so far so good....I have a few pics and speaker on it for now but will probably change later!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Elegant and Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: We got our table today. Assembled with no problem, which I was worried about due to the reviews, just don't rush thru it and you'll be fine, take your time looking at the pics and ensure you have them position the right way and it's a piece of cake. It's a deep cappuccino color so it may look black but with the right accents you can lighten it up. We love it and looks modern and elegant. I was able to fit an 8x10 frame at the bottom and a signed basket all on the shelf below the top shelf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. It is thin enough that it doesn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: Very modern design. We were looking for a simple, modern, entry-way type design. This is perfect. It is thin enough that it doesn't take up too much space. This is definitely a step up from Ikea furniture - quality wise. Much sturdier and you can still see the wood grain. It ships un-built but was very simple to put together. Overall, this was a great,simple and modern piece of furniture to add to our home at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT piece for under a painting; pulls the room together nicely! I needed something to pull the black & grays from the painting to better blend with my brown leather sectional; this espresso finish does that well! I also wanted something that had a small footprint so it didn't stick out too far from the wall, perfect! Looks like a more expensive piece when assembled. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Bug Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet Maker Needed
customer_reviews.text: This table has the worst instructions I have ever seen. Impossible and yet it says it takes only 20 minutes for assembly. To make matters worse, you are instructed to drill a hole in a wall to keep it from falling over. I definitely would not recommend it, although the wood is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie V

customer_reviews.title: Love the piece, don't  love the assembly
customer_reviews.text: So.... I would give this 5 stars for the wood, dark espresso color and appeal. I would give 2.5 to 3 stars for assembly. I have put together MANY pieces of furniture. Ikea, etc and this had to be the HARDEST one yet. It took close to 4 hours. Absolutely crazy. There are no written directions (as is common with many assembled pieces) -just a diagram. But THIS diagram was very poorly designed.... If you like a challenge and have the patience I would definitely buy. It looks great in our hallway!!
customer_reviews.author: food lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together that I over thought it and took about ten minutes longer than I needed because I thought I had to be doing it wrong. All said and done it took maybe 25 minutes from unpack to place where I wanted once complete. Nice and solid feel to it. Comes with a way to anchor it to the wall, I didn't care for the method so will be securing with some other way, but I like that it came with something. I love the color and size, I wanted something tall but sturdy. I would definitely purchase again (to have a set) and recommend it. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: This requires extensive assembly and directions are AWFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: Why does the description state no assembly required?? It comes with horrid directions and in hundreds of pieces!! If I could box it back up I would send it back. I have assembled many things over the years and this is by far the worst set of directions I have ever seen. Its awful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for decor purposes ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I had to take two starts because it was so hard to put together! The instructions were not helpful and the parts didn’t match the pictures AT ALL! I finally got it together but it’s wobbly. I’ll keep it for two reasons. 1-I’m not about to take this shit back apart lol and 2- it serves it’s purpose in my home. I only have it as an entry table. It’s only job is to hold up a lamp and some keys, that’s it. It looks just like the picture, very nice, good size. Just wish it was more sturdy. Which obviously it would be if installation was easier.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Clare

customer_reviews.title: Not cappuccino color
customer_reviews.text: It’s most definitely not cappuccino color the instructions are horrible small dings im sure that was the mail lady that did that she was struggling to bring it to me I saw through my camera at my door (not heavy) possibly returning the color is definitely darker like espresso almost black
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Barragan

customer_reviews.title: They did a nice job in packaging all the pieces
customer_reviews.text: They did a nice job in packaging all the pieces, even all the assembly pieces. However, the directions for assembly are really poorly written. It took several times to read and then reread to make sure we were doing the right thing. One of the legs still isn't held together properly, the screw would never tighten, hopefully the weight will hold. Once complete it is nice looking, however you can only have it against a wall, the back side is unfinished. It is reasonably priced, however, I can't say I would recommend purchase, I think the price charged for the final product is still on the high side, it is really better priced around the $55.00 or under mark.
customer_reviews.author: CherylG

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: looks great when it's all put together but it was really hard for 1 person to do it ( 65 yr old woman w/o an electric drill ) I highly suggest 2 people just because the legs have angles and it's hard to hold it and screw it together w/o someone holding it for you..........looks GREAT THOUGH !
customer_reviews.author: susan o.

customer_reviews.title: Worst piece of crap ever
customer_reviews.text: This table is a disaster don't waste your money.Instructions is not clear you need yourself and Jesus to put it together.It broke by following the idiots who wrote instructions instruction Buyers beware and don't waste your money or time. I am only giving it one star because there is no other option.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is HELLISH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so annoyed by the assembly instructions that I stopped assembling to give a review. Someone posted that it will take themselves and a Jesus to assemble this table...I say it’s going to take Father Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, King Solomon and Jesus to assist with a successful assembly of this table. I can’t see if it was worth the money, it definitely is not worth the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Sharada N. Williams

customer_reviews.title: 20 minutes to assemble, yah right!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful piece that would look gorgeous in our dining room but it is a huge pain in my rear to put together! Are all of these people saying it was easy to assemble actual people or were they carpenters in a past life!?! I am pretty much giving up before I throw the pieces across the room!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: With a foyer table, good things will happen
customer_reviews.text: I probably rate things too high, maybe my expectations are low. I don't think so. I read the descriptions and when things show up on my door step and are exactly as described, that meets my expectations. Anyway, this is a sweet little side table, fits nicely in the foyer of our house, I really like the color and again I think the description was spot on; Warm matte red cocoa finish, really encompasses the depth of it's look. It's wasn't long after buying this table that my wife got pregnant, not that we had been trying for a long time, but I feel like maybe this table brought the room together and helped set the mood.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorjoe

customer_reviews.title: Not at all satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting much better quality for the price they are asking and if you are not expert in assembly it will be difficult to assemble After reading so many reviews I thought of buying it but really not satisfying
customer_reviews.author: Chander

customer_reviews.title: Gotta be a very patient hand- man to assemble an otherwise nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly, incredibly difficult to assemble. And I have done hundreds of IKEA furniture in my life. From Step 1 to step 2, because of the poor assembly design, it is a very unsteady, shaky process, with the risk of damaging the plywood. Happened to me. Unexpectedly they delivered some glue with it! So I really had to use the glue, to glue back the plywood piece that had come off. 1 star for assembling. 5 stars for the final look. The picture adequately describes the esthetical finish. So 1 + 5 = 6. Divide that by 2 and we have an average of 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysse888

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is exactly as pictured. It's very sturdy. And it's very easy to put together. All those complaining about assembly in the reviews must be completely inept. If you can follow simple instructions, and know how to use a screwdriver, assembly should take about 20-30 minutes, and the result will be a beautiful looking, sturdy piece of furniture. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This did require some real assembly, but it’s worth it. The pieces are heavy and sturdy. The table looks like it is worth more than the $60 price tag. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Prime Shopper21

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! & great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love how well packaged it came! Protective corners all around. Instructions were easy to follow (I'm an Engineer) put together in 15 minutes using electric screw driver. The quality is very nice and had not scratches or defects due to its great packaging. I was certainly impressed. I must say though that you have to put it against the wall as its doesn't have the nice finish all around. I will add photos later when I get a chance. I would highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit!
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly what I needed. There was a problem with the top of the unit (the holes were drilled incorrectly), but that was promptly remedied after contacting the seller. It's very sturdy, directions were clear and it went together easily. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this plus the matching coffee table. Still waiting on the coffee table. The look of this table is exactly what I wanted for a great price. Yes it has particle board, but it definitely fills its purpose. Doesn't look cheap at all. Easy assembly, I put it together in 30 min. Be careful though, I would suggest having another person present in assisting to hold things. Me being impatient did this assemble this myself and I tore a small piece off the second shelf. I glued it back and unless you look super close its not noticeable. Butt all in all I am happy with this buy, can't wait for the coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Codi Beltz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this shelf for more than a year and I love. It was a great buy and it looks really good. Assemble was hard no directions came inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: Solid Table
customer_reviews.text: In short, it is a fantastic table. The quality is acceptable for the price, and it is not too hard to put together. It was the perfect size for what I needed. I display old books with some bookends on the top, and store DVDs and blu rays on the shelf. Pros: Looks classy Unique Design Sturdy Cons: Made of particle board Not all sides are finished so it must be put against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan W

customer_reviews.title: B.S. Directions, purchase your own screws, cute to look at though.
customer_reviews.text: Cute to look at...hard to put together. My boyfriend has put together everything in our living room correctly & fast. But this!!!! He struggled with. The reason is you have to purchase your own screws & they have B.S. Directions. Many reviews I see people have had to purchase their own screws & say it has B.S. Directions...I agree. It is cute to look at though. Be ware!!! Using the screws provided yes...it will fall to pieces when moving it to your desired area.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small area
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to order this with the reviews that it is difficult to assemble, but found if you follow the directions it went together very easy. Looks nice in my entryway. Was looking for something that had the height but not very deep. This was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table but a huge pain in the butt ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table but a huge pain in the butt to put together. I've put many pieces of furniture together. The one hole in one of the legs did not mesh up with the peg so was unable to anchor the top on one end. It's a very nice looking table don't get me wrong. But what was I thinking! An Ikea had just opened up where I live!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: This table is uniquely beautiful!! It took me a little while to ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is uniquely beautiful!! It took me a little while to assemble it because the instructions on one of the steps were not as clear. I had gotten 2 sets of the screws reversed because the instructions were not clear but when I just took a chance and switched them, the table fit together perfectly. Despite the unclear instructions (although someone else may have no difficulties), I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for Apartment Foyer
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my apartment’s foyer. Assembly was a little frustrating, but it was complete in a couple hours. Color matches a lot of my other furniture. The size is just right for holding my purse and misc stuff near the door. The height is about 6-8” under the light switch and doesn’t block any of my outlets either. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Great console for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you in a market for a modern foyer console this is the one to buy. I got it together with the matching mirror. Both look great and compliment the overall style of the apartment. Two small issues I have. During the assembly I've noticed that some screw holes don't match with screws and another problem is that this unit will keep your finger prints on. So, I have to wipe it twice daily. Lastly, although both items look great and have nice modern design please keep in mind this is not a real wood. Aside from that very nice console and mirror. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. Other reviews said they had issues with the assembly...I could see how, the instructions took a few reads to fully understand, but for the most part, we assembled without any issues (all parts were there). Looks just like the advertised picture once assembled, very nice addition to my living room decor
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is perfect for our needs [along a short section of wall]
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is perfect for our needs [along a short section of wall], it isn't too big nor is it too small, and it pretty cool looking. Just remember, at only $64, the back isn't finished, and it isn't real wood, but since the color is super dark brown [almost black], you don't notice the quality as much.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great look and very solid for under $70
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece! Great look and very solid for under $70. Very unique piece, looks great in my apartment! 4 stars only because it was truly harder than it needed to be to assemble, in my opinion. That said it wasn't HARD to assemble... Just harder than it needed to be and rather time consuming!
customer_reviews.author: GbMaxSE

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: We bought our house 5 years ago and I had been looking for a great entry way table. So glad I went with this table, it's very stylish and a very descent size. It only took my husband less than 30 minutes to put together. I'm so happy with my purchase. ***Update*** We have now been in our house 10 years. I just ordered another one for the other side of our entryway. The first one I ordered 5 years ago is still in tip top shape. We have gotten so many compliments over the years. The table is very unique and it catches the eye of anyone. I’m so happy with my purchase once again.
customer_reviews.author: TJA

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and the dark espresso color
customer_reviews.text: This small table is much sturdier than I expected t to be. Seems to be made well. I love the design and the dark espresso color. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rose

customer_reviews.title: Stylin' on em!
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of mixed reviews, but i have to say i love my table and I'm extremely satisfied with it. Its cute & sturdy. It took a sec for my brother to figure out how to put it together but it wasn't difficult nor did i need to purchase additional hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love it .. I have received so many compliments and everyone want to know where i got it from..its not to big or to small it just right, a perfect fit right by the front entrance...thank you
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: Take a deep breath!
customer_reviews.text: I spent five hours putting it together! Directions are not very clear (I had a few parts left over). But it fits the purpose exactly, it looks nice for the money and it seems fairly sturdy, What was not clear is that it can be tippy because they included a tie-down strap. I guess common sense should have told me that, although it does not wobble without it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Gerding

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it over a year now and its working perfectly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Arimusch

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my entryway in my studio apartment. It works but the set-up is unnecessarily complicated. Took far longer than 30 minutes just since nothing would line up in place. But it does work and looks good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: alwayssleepy86

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely and tastefully in the foyer. Love it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table !!!
customer_reviews.text: My local furniture store had this piece for $25 more and you had to pick up the box; they charged $99 for delivery so I ordered it here. It is just as nice as it looks in the picture. It is very sturdy and fits perfectly in my space. I am woman in my 50's and I was able to put this together by myself. It took a few hours, but I felt great once it was done! My only suggestion is that it would be nice if there were step by step instructions as well as just the pictures. All in all this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price. Came with wrong screws.
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. It came with some screws that were too long, but I was able to find some replacements at Home Depot. Not all that difficult to assemble, but not a breeze either. Quality was acceptable, but not that sturdy, and in fact the table comes its screws to screw it against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: EllenKT

customer_reviews.title: For more junk to display
customer_reviews.text: If you built IKEA stuff then this should not be hard for you to assemble, I got this up within 20 mins and looks amazing. I was looking for a small item to put in front of my window and this is perfect. I’m very happy with the fine and so glad the back is thick. Most items I got have been that flimsy cardboard that is nailed in. This actually requires you to screw it in to place with I was happy for.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi D.

customer_reviews.title: As described. Overall very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in SO many pieces and somewhat confusing directions. My husband assembled it for me after my failed attempt to decipher the instructions. The table is not super sturdy but it does come with a wall anchor so it cant be pulled/knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Arrah Hart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful look
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand have had it now for over 4 yesrs
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: directions are confusing
customer_reviews.text: The table is bigger than I thought it would be and the wood is stronger. However, the directions are impossible to follow for only one person - it looks like the table is suspended in air in some pictures so if you don't have someone else to hold it up that won't work. i just looked to see where each screw was supposed to go and didn't follow the steps. That seemed to work much better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table for a great price! I'd been eyeing up this table for weeks before I finally purchased one for myself. I have a small foyer wall that was bare and needed a little something. This table is perfect! It's classy and adds a touch of elegance. My 14 year old son put this together himself & fairly quickly. Recommend to anyone looking for a little something to add to a bare wall space.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture. Much darker than my other mocha furniture. hopefully I can use it when I finish the basement. Pretty easy to put together I just don't understand whey manufacturers have started using such a large bolt and expect a sticker to cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: TRHenry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shelf and right size for me
customer_reviews.text: I love my stand. It's the right color for my decor and fits the purfic spot against my wall. It's just the right size and it makes my small collection of wines look nice
customer_reviews.author: Mia M

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a total piece of crap,. Instructions are difficult. Pieces don’t align, screws aren’t the right fit. I’m so annoyed . Do not buy this . Idc how many reviews it has! Those people were lucky don’t risk it. the top came the wrong way so the wooden part is on top smh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to the wall it holds a 10 gallon aquarium very well. I also have the tank mounted to the wall. The height makes for a great display. Love this table. Was pretty much impossible to get the top on so I took off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for years and it is still as good as new! It was moderately easy to assemble. It is a very nice height as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miguel Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, took a while to assemble especially the rotating screews as they kept falling out. Its good to pay attention to the instructions before fixing as i paid a price when i found out i had to loosen some screens to start all over again. Overall, it was not soo hard to put together and it look good. Only wish it was a little bit higher.
customer_reviews.author: Dupsy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but those directions😲😲
customer_reviews.text: So let me start by saying i dont put alot of thongs together...more recently now because we just moved. I attempted to put this together by myself..couldnt get it right it sat behind my couch for 3weeks not touched. Today i had someone help me which i think was the problem you need 4 hands took about 30-45 mins because the directions are so confussingly simple if that makes sense. Good luck. I rated a 3 because it looked nice when complete but those directions are terrible
customer_reviews.author: Kanesha Dove

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVED the outcome. It looks expensive and very modern. Already looking to see what I can put on it (:
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, good price but pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but very cheap quality and found it difficult to put together even with the directions. The screws for the bottom weren't long enough to fit through the spot and I even tried all the other screws provided and none worked. Size and color are what I wanted and I am happy with that but it is not sturdy AT ALL not going to put much on it
customer_reviews.author: The Ives

customer_reviews.title: No directions
customer_reviews.text: It came with no directions to put it together. Very frustrated and ready to just send it back
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fully Furnished
customer_reviews.text: The setup was a tad trickier than an Ikea product but the build quality is good and it's modern design lends itself well to a modern home aesthetic. The lower shelves a little narrower then expected but can easily accommodate keys, leashes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table =)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small table to use in my church by our entrance, just something nice out of the way, where we can put up some decor and flyers/handouts for the parishioners. This table definitely fit the bill. IT was easy to put together, looks very nice, great quality and very functional. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks really nice! BUT arrived with a huge scratch on the back panel. It's not super noticable now that we have items on it, so we are going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Csquared

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to home
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this piece of furniture is nicer and better than I expected. Putting together was a little tricky if you’re doing by yourself, though. Price is right and I quality is good - recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packaging and the finish. Was expecting little more darker shade. The instructions were easy and the tools were all packed nicely. Overall it is a good product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sasi

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Took about 45 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Took about 45 minutes to put together. Looks more expensive then it is. Perfect for my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Nef

customer_reviews.title: Great look.
customer_reviews.text: Great entry way stand. Perfect for car keys and mail.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Rada

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I do not write reviews for products until I have been able to use them for a while. Needed an end table for when we walk in the house to leave our keys and mail on. Took me about 45 min to put together. Good instructions, easy to put together. Works perfectly for what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Solomon C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: I put the table together today. It took less than 20 minutes. The table is very sturdy. I love it. It is the finishing piece to my dining room
customer_reviews.author: tiffany rose

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is the stand looks great for the price and it doesn't take up too ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these, I originally purchased for a printer stand and then my mom decided to get one to replace her computer desk. And then we redid my son's room and realized that his chest was too tall for his game console and TV equipment to be on so he asked for one of the stands too. All I can say is the stand looks great for the price and it doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase. It's a beautiful table. I bought it for a console table to put our cable box on and other things like that but when I got it put together, it looked so good, I have in our front room with some candles and decor. I get compliments on it a lot. Love this table, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: From reading previous reviews, I thought this would be very difficult to put together but it didn't as long as I thought it would and, once assembled, looks really good. Delivery was quick, there were no missing parts, and I'm very pleased with my purchase. The item looks very good in my apartment and have recommended to others who have commented on it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley

customer_reviews.title: Print so small it's tough to read and directions were worse. I am a woman but very mechanical
customer_reviews.text: I can only give a 2 with the regards of assembly!! Absolute nightmare. Print so small it's tough to read and directions were worse. I am a woman but very mechanical. It should not have been that difficult. It does look nice when done but I hope no one touches it so it doesn't come apart.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA GRIFFIN

customer_reviews.title: Item looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Item looks good but its made out particle board very light but has fastener to attach to wall if needed.Overall looks pretty good,nice dark finish.Good directions all parts were present put together in about an half and hour.Measurement are L=31 1/2 inches Length,W= 11 1/2 inches Width and H= 34 inches.Hope this helps in the future purchases.Packed very well arrived on time.Paid $110.00 on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TexasVybz

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: Missing cam bolt. Came with 3 instead of 4. Called the company (Coaster) and not impressed with their customer service. They are sending me the entire hardware kit which is a waste of materials. They can't just send the 1 cam bolt needed to complete installation and it will take up to 10 days to receive. Table at least looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: took a little time but I’m very patient and I anticipated the finishing product and it’s just a neat and beautiful piece for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman and I assembled this piece of furniture myself......took a little time but I’m very patient and I anticipated the finishing product and it’s just a neat and beautiful piece for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ozana L.

customer_reviews.title: its pretty but probably won't last for more than 5 years
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and took about 40 minutes. It looks really nice and is great for apartment living because it doesn't take up alot of floor space but it is tall and creates storage. I don't see it lasting very long because the building materials aren't the best quality
customer_reviews.author: Johnny five

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and was easy to put together. I would have given it 5 stars if the back of the shelves were not bare. You can see the particle board. Sure, it should be against the wall, so it is not visible, but it would have been better if it was all finished.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fam

customer_reviews.title: though I'd like to say it's not as stable as I hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year. It works, though I'd like to say it's not as stable as I hoped for. There are small spots that are falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal

customer_reviews.title: looks nice in my living room
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and looks real nice in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase at all. The color is different shades for each piece and it is hard to assemble. Not to mention it is made of very cheap material and chips for absolutely anything. I've had this table for LESS THAN A MONTH and it looks like I've had it for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rosa

customer_reviews.title: For what it is, not bad.  I just hate, despite, loathe plywood and particle board and didn't know it was
customer_reviews.text: On the one hand it looks nice, is sturdy, nice height, overall I like it. However, I would not have ordered this had it been more clear this is made of particle board/plywood not actual whole pieces of quality lumber. Granted, you can only expect so much for $65.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Stone

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the "pub"!
customer_reviews.text: turned a little dining room into a cozy Irish pub ... this was the prefect piece to squeeze in next to the piano and hold the Pilsner glasses. easy to assemble. nice quality. perfect rich, brown color. love it.
customer_reviews.author: lincoln's girl

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: This table was easy to put together. I am actually using it as a TV stand in a small office. I did not have a lot of space for a regular TV stand. The size is perfect and my 32" TV looks great on it. It shipped fast and so far I am satisfied with this piece of furniture. Love the triangular look!
customer_reviews.author: MMV

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Not your typical table shape, which is why we chose it! It's so lovely to have this table as the first thing we see when we walk through the door. It's the perfect size for being the entryway table in our compact house and it's gorgeous with its espresso color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice but I thought it would be hardwood throughout
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice but I thought it would be hardwood throughout. The piece is sturdy and great for any entry way or the end of a hallway. I would recommend this product. I gave a four-star rating because of the pressed wood pieces.
customer_reviews.author: The Washington Way

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - Fiberglass was all over the place
customer_reviews.text: This thing had fiber glass all over it... It got in my throat and I am not happy now to say the least... I may put it together with a mask on but I'm pretty pissed off that this company would deliver such a toxic product to its customers!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Lou

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. It looks really nice in my living room on a 4' wall and fits perfect with my modern decor. Be aware that it's the pressed board type furniture that comes in a box that you have to put together so it will not stand up to much abuse and will scratch easy, but if you don't have destructive kids/pets it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Jo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble. And the value for money is perfecto
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: I like the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, was decent. It is NOT a solid wood by the way...the materials or "wood type" is very similar sold by IKEA. Installation is easy just be careful that you don't damage the wood screw connections cause it's wobbly connecting the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Godisan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but assembly is a pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have built a lot of furniture and this was not easy. The instructions were not that legible. After I got it together it was fine. I am using it in the corner behind the couch to hold a lamp so you don't even see it. For the price it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Home improvement gal

customer_reviews.title: it looks OK and good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to assemble this unit...it looks OK and good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: etc and it does a fine job. Very stable too
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a bit more of a pain than i thought it would be, but once assembled it looks lovely. I use it just inside my doorway for keys/mail, etc and it does a fine job. Very stable too. I took off a star because certain parts were so difficult to assemble, it didn't seem like they were even from the same piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: MaddShadez

customer_reviews.title: Item came not put together
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item because it stated no assembly required. When the item was delivered it needed to put together. I attempted to put it together which tunrd out not to be very easy. The parst were not marked. I was not very happy
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing all the screws, came with minimal hardware, looks like a great product if I could put it together. Now I have to call the company during normal business hours.
customer_reviews.author: Aflew001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking unit - looks great as a centerpiece in the foyer of our job.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

product_meta.title: Coaster Home Furnishings Console Entry Table, Cappuccino
product_meta.description: Angular in shape, this console table offers a dynamic design meant to impress. Dress up a transitional room with a space for displaying books, décor, or potted greenery. Luscious cappuccino offers a bold, dynamic finish. An eye-catching slanted silhouette creates a visual treat. Add this console to a central living space or an entryway.
feature_bullets: Materials: Engineered Veneer, MDF, Particle Board, Hollow Board

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars805 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
